1377720.name: Penny's Path Soundtrack
1377720.description: This is the official soundtrack of the Penny's Path game and features a primarily orchestral score. In addition to the tracks for the major events in the game, each character's signature song motif is included as well as all travel music. Also included are several bonus tracks, including Penny's Path ending credits song (featuring South African singer Abigail Strickland) and even a 45-minute mystery play further exploring some of the thematic material in Penny's Path.
